name: Coconut Island 🏝
description:
Cliché shipwrecked. Getting by by eating coconuts, survive and find your way home.

Made for Wowie Game Jam

HOW TO PLAY
  • Step 1. Wait for coconuts
  • Step 2. Grab coconuts
  • Step 3. Hit the tree
  • Step 4. ???
  • Step 5. PROFIT!!!
HINTS
  • HIT THE COCONUT AT THE GODDAMN TREE!
  • Perhaps building a pyramid of 6 coconuts could help you find your way home... or not ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
CONTROLS
  • Walk: A/D or Left/Right Arrow
  • Jump: W or Up Arrow
  • Grab/Ungrab: Left Click/Right Click
  • Crack Coconuts Open: Also Left Click
  • F5: Refresh page if you're on the browser incase you're spawned into the game without an eye but a perfect sense of sound allowing you to hear the ocean around you
CREDITS
  • Coconuts: Google Images
  • Some Sprites: Kenney.NL
  • Sound: Zapsplat and Youtube
  • Music: The Coconut Song
